@graph.name: Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC)
@graph.description: Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC) is a regime-dependent thermodynamic framework in which cosmic structure, gravity, and large-scale dynamics emerge from measurable energy and entropy flow interactions, without invoking dark matter, dark energy, or a cosmological constant.

@graph.name: Morten Magnusson
@graph.description: Independent researcher and founder of Energy-Flow Cosmology (EFC), developing regime-dependent, entropy-bounded models of cosmology and complex systems grounded in thermodynamics and empirical validation.
